example.name: perspicuous
example.text: Hiroshima's waterworks bureau said the municipal government had budgeted about 11 million yen ($77,500) for the project.

example.name: passivized project
example.text: Mitsubishi is also pushing ahead with a controversial plan to redevelop Marunouchi into a business center of high-tech buildings, [a project]-2 budgeted *trace*-2 for 30 years and six trillion yen.
example.arg: for 30 years and six trillion yen

example.name: passive, different prep
example.text: [The move]-1, budgeted *trace*-1 at about $7 million, actually came in at about $10 million, he said.

example.name: just project
example.text: Knowledgeable employees said the retrofitting, which *trace* hadn't yet been budgeted *trace*-1, was part of a planned, three-stage reinforcement of the Cypress structure begun by the California transportation department several years ago.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'budget' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.
